ðŸ“– Summary: Checkmate is an open-source, self-hosted tool for monitoring server infrastructure. It tracks server hardware, uptime, response times, and incidents in real-time, providing alerts and visualizations. An optional agent, Capture, provides additional insights into server CPU, RAM, disk, and temperature status.
